text: Breaking: NYS Judge James Burke rules NYPD can now keep anyone (peaceful protestors arrested for curfew and criminal looters) detained for over 24 hours given these are extraordinary times. “It’s a crisis within a crisis", he said. "All writs are denied, BK, BX and manhattan"

domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: Protests in the US
entity.description: US cities rocked by unrest following the death of George Floyd as he was detained by police.
